## Read in the data

```{r read-data, message = F}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(car)

beijing <- read_csv("beijing.csv")

```

## Exercise 1

```{r ex-1}

m1 <- lm(SO2 ~ as.factor(month) + TEMP + PRES + DEWP + RAIN + wd + WSPM, data = beijing)
summary(m1)

```
